settings.title: WHO ARE WE
settings.content: We are based in Rotorua, operating store, BUDGET COMPUTERS & KIWI MOBILES, since 2014 for Smartphones, computers and peripherals sales and services. The products we are selling have in stock at our Rotorua Physical shop, as soon we receive to confirm the order, we will ship in two working days.

settings.title: Our services and products
settings.text:
Budget Computers & Kiwi Mobiles Rotorua

Budget Computers was founded in Hamilton in 2004. There are now four shops in Hamilton, Tauranga and Rotorua.

Our records show we have done 41 thousand mobile phone and computer repairs.

Each store is individually owned.

settings.title: 1.Can I change my shipping address after placing an order?
settings.content:
Please be advised that your shipping address
cannot be revised after the order has been placed successfully. However, before
your order being shipped, we will try our best to help you to revise your
shipping address. So please make sure that your shipping address is right and
if you have any question, please feel free to contact us.

settings.title: 2.How do I track my order?
settings.content:
After your order is shipped, a tracking number
will appear. You can track your order on our company's website with the tracking
number provided.
It may take 48 hours for the tracking information to be updated.
